step.datasource: INSERT INTO [PPG_TRANSFER]..MATERIALS_TO_KARDEX (STATUS, ARTICLE, DESCRIPTION_1, MAINSUPPLIER, EAN, UOM, DESCRIPTION_5, SYSCREATED, SYSMODIFIED) SELECT 0 AS STATUS, i.Itemcode AS ARTICLE, SUBSTRING( i.Description, 0, 50) AS DESCRIPTION_1, SUBSTRING((LTRIM(c.crdcode) + ' - ' + c.cmp_name), 0, 50) AS MAINSUPPLIER, ia.ItemCodeAccount AS EAN, i.PackageDescription AS UOM, i.UserNumber_11 AS DESCRIPTION_5, GETDATE() AS SYSCREATED, GETDATE() AS SYSMODIFIED FROM [400]..Items i (nolock) LEFT JOIN [400]..cicmpy c (nolocK) on c.crdnr = i.lev_crdnr LEFT JOIN [400]..ItemAccounts ia (nolock) ON i.ItemCode = ia.ItemCode AND ia.crdnr = c.crdnr WHERE i.UserNumber_11 IN (1,2,12) AND i.itemcode collate database_default NOT IN (select MaterialName from [PowerPick_TEST]..MaterialBase) AND i.itemcode collate database_default NOT IN (SELECT ARTICLE FROM [PPG_TRANSFER]..MATERIALS_TO_KARDEX WHERE STATUS BETWEEN 0 AND 3 AND CONVERT(DATE,SYSCREATED) = CONVERT(DATE,GETDATE()))

INSERT INTO [PPG_TRANSFER].[dbo].[ORDERS_TO_KARDEX] ([STATUS],[ORDERNR],[PRIORITY],[WAREHOUSE],[LINE],[ARTICLE],[QTY],[DIRECTION],[OH_INFO1],[OH_INFO2],[OH_INFO3],[OL_INFO1],[SYSMODIFIED],[SYSCREATED])
SELECT 0 AS STATUS, gmt.bkstnr_sub AS ORDERNR, 1 AS PRIORITY, 'Onderdelen_Mag' AS WAREHOUSE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY gmt.bkstnr_sub ORDER BY gmt.bkstnr_sub, gmt.artcode) AS LINE, gmt.artcode AS ARTICLE, gmt.aantal AS QTY, 1 AS DIRECTION, 'Purchase Order' AS OH_INFO1, LEFT(gmt.oms25, 50) AS OH_INFO2, LEFT(LTRIM(RTRIM(cmp.crdcode + ' - ' + cmp.cmp_name)),50) AS OH_INFO3, LEFT(i.Description_0,50) AS OL_INFO1, GETDATE() AS SYSMODIFIED, GETDATE() AS SYSCREATED FROM [400]..gbkmut gmt WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [400]..grtbk gbk WITH (NOLOCK) ON gbk.reknr = gmt.reknr AND gbk.omzrek NOT IN ('C','D','V') INNER JOIN [400]..Items i WITH (NOLOCK) ON i.ItemCode = gmt.artcode AND (gmt.reknr=i.GLAccountDistribution OR gmt.reknr=i.GLAccountAsset) LEFT JOIN [400]..cicmpy cmp WITH (NOLOCK) ON cmp.crdnr = gmt.crdnr AND cmp.crdnr IS NOT NULL AND gmt.crdnr IS NOT NULL WHERE transtype IN ('X','N','C','P') AND gmt.oorsprong ='R' AND gmt.transsubtype IN ('A') AND gmt.bkstnr_sub IS NOT NULL AND i.Type <> 'P' AND gmt.datum = CONVERT(DATE, GETDATE()) AND gmt.warehouse = '1' AND i.UserNumber_11 IN (2,12) AND gmt.bkstnr_sub NOT IN (SELECT [ORDERNR] COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT FROM [PPG_TRANSFER].[dbo].[ORDERS_TO_KARDEX] WHERE gmt.artcode COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT = ARTICLE AND CONVERT(DATE, SYSCREATED) = CONVERT(DATE, gmt.syscreated) ) ORDER BY gmt.bkstnr_sub,gmt.artcode

INSERT INTO [PPG_TRANSFER].[dbo].[ORDERS_TO_KARDEX] ([STATUS] ,[ORDERNR], [PRIORITY], [WAREHOUSE], [LINE], [ARTICLE], [QTY], [DIRECTION], [OH_INFO1], [OH_INFO2], [OL_INFO1], [OL_INFO2], [SYSMODIFIED], [SYSCREATED])
SELECT 0 AS STATUS, p.Projectnr AS ORDERNR, 1 AS PRIORITY, 'Onderdelen_Mag' AS WAREHOUSE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY p.Projectnr ORDER BY p.Projectnr, ir.ItemCode) AS LINE, ir.ItemCode as ARTICLE, SUM(gi.aantal) AS QTY, 2 AS DIRECTION, 'Production Order' AS OH_INFO1, g.artcode AS OH_INFO2, LEFT(ir.Description_0,50) AS OL_INFO1, COUNT(*) AS OL_INFO2, GETDATE() AS SYSMODIFIED, GETDATE() AS SYSCREATED FROM [400]..PrProject p WITH (NOLOCK) JOIN [400]..gbkmut g WITH (NOLOCK) ON p.ProjectNr=g.project AND g.bud_vers='MRP' AND g.transtype='B' AND g.freefield1='P' AND g.transsubtype = 'A' AND g.BlockItem=0 AND g.Reviewed=1 AND g.Checked=1 and not g.TransactionGuid2 is null JOIN [400]..gbkmut gi WITH (NOLOCK) ON p.ProjectNr=gi.project AND gi.bud_vers='MRP' AND gi.transtype='B' AND gi.freefield1='P' AND gi.transsubtype = 'B' AND gi.Reviewed=1 AND gi.Checked=1 and gi.TransactionGuid2 is null JOIN [400]..Items ir WITH (NOLOCK) ON ir.ItemCode=gi.artcode
WHERE p.Type='P' AND g.Selcode IN ('PM', 'PS') AND ir.UserNumber_11 IN (2,12) AND p.ProjectNr NOT IN (SELECT [ORDERNR] COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT FROM [PPG_TRANSFER].[dbo].[ORDERS_TO_KARDEX] WHERE ir.ItemCode COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT = ARTICLE AND CONVERT(DATE, SYSCREATED) = CONVERT(DATE, GETDATE()) )
GROUP BY p.ProjectNr,g.artcode,ir.Itemcode, ir.Description_0 ORDER BY p.ProjectNr, ir.ItemCode

INSERT INTO [PPG_TRANSFER].[dbo].[ORDERS_TO_KARDEX] ([STATUS] ,[ORDERNR], [PRIORITY], [WAREHOUSE], [LINE], [ARTICLE], [QTY], [DIRECTION], [OH_INFO1], [OH_INFO2], [OH_INFO3], [OL_INFO1], [SYSMODIFIED], [SYSCREATED])
SELECT 0 AS STATUS, g2.bkstnr AS ORDERNR, CASE WHEN (g.oms25 LIKE 'HOT%') THEN 4 ELSE 1 END AS PRIORITY, 'Onderdelen_Mag' AS WAREHOUSE, 1 AS LINE, g2.artcode as ARTICLE, ABS(g2.aantal) AS QTY, CASE WHEN (g2.aantal > 0) THEN 1 ELSE 2 END AS DIRECTION, 'Internal Order' AS OH_INFO1, LEFT(g2.oms25,50) AS OH_INFO2, g2.faktuurnr AS OH_INFO3, LEFT(i.Description_0,50) AS OL_INFO1, GETDATE() AS SYSMODIFIED, GETDATE() AS SYSCREATED
FROM [400]..gbkmut g WITH (NOLOCK,INDEX(IX_gbkmut_InternalUse)) JOIN [400]..gbkmut g2 WITH (NOLOCK) ON g.faktuurnr = g2.faktuurnr AND g2.Transtype = 'N' and g2.Transsubtype = 'B' JOIN [400]..Items i WITH (NOLOCK) ON g2.artcode = i.ItemCode AND g2.reknr=i.GLAccountDistribution and i.type not in ('L','P') WHERE g.Transtype = 'B' and g.Transsubtype = 'B' and g.freefield1 = 'I' AND g.bud_vers = 'MRP' AND NOT g.TransactionGuid2 IS NULL AND g.datum = CONVERT(DATE, GETDATE()) --AND g.sysmodified > DATEADD(MINUTE, -3, GETDATE()) AND g.warehouse = '1' AND i.UserNumber_11 IN (2,12) AND g2.bkstnr NOT IN (SELECT [ORDERNR] COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT FROM [PPG_TRANSFER].[dbo].[ORDERS_TO_KARDEX] WHERE g2.artcode COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT = ARTICLE ) ORDER BY g2.bkstnr

INSERT INTO [PPG_TRANSFER].[dbo].[ORDERS_TO_KARDEX] ([STATUS] ,[ORDERNR], [PRIORITY], [WAREHOUSE], [LINE], [ARTICLE], [QTY], [DIRECTION], [OH_INFO1], [OH_INFO2], [OL_INFO1], [SYSMODIFIED], [SYSCREATED])
SELECT 0 AS STATUS, g.IBTDeliveryNr AS ORDERNR, CASE WHEN (g.oms25 LIKE 'HOT%') THEN 4 ELSE 1 END AS PRIORITY, 'Onderdelen_Mag' AS WAREHOUSE, 1 AS LINE, i.ItemCode as ARTICLE, ABS(SUM(g.aantal)) AS QTY, CASE WHEN (SUM(g.aantal) < 0) THEN 2 ELSE 1 END AS DIRECTION, 'Interbranch Transfer' AS OH_INFO1, LEFT(g.oms25,50) AS OH_INFO2, LEFT(i.Description_0,50) AS OL_INFO1, GETDATE() AS SYSMODIFIED, GETDATE() AS SYSCREATED
FROM [400]..gbkmut g WITH (NOLOCK) JOIN [400]..Items i WITH (NOLOCK) ON g.artcode = i.ItemCode and g.reknr=i.GLAccountDistribution
WHERE g.Transtype = 'B' AND g.bud_vers = 'MRP' and g.Checked = 1 and g.Reviewed = 1 and g.BlockItem = 1 AND g.Status = 5 and g.type IN(1150, 1151) AND NOT g.IBTDeliveryNr IS NULL AND g.datum = CONVERT(DATE, GETDATE()) --AND g.sysmodified > DATEADD(MINUTE, -3, GETDATE()) AND g.warehouse = '1' AND i.UserNumber_11 IN (2,12) AND g.IBTDeliveryNr NOT IN (SELECT [ORDERNR] COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT FROM [PPG_TRANSFER].[dbo].[ORDERS_TO_KARDEX] WHERE g.artcode COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT = ARTICLE ) AND g.IBTDeliveryNr NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT g.IBTDeliveryNr FROM [400]..gbkmut g WITH (NOLOCK) JOIN [400]..Items i WITH (NOLOCK) ON g.artcode = i.ItemCode and g.reknr=i.GLAccountDistribution WHERE g.Transtype = 'B' AND g.bud_vers = 'MRP' and g.Checked = 1 and g.Reviewed = 1 and g.BlockItem = 1 AND g.Status = 5 and g.type IN(1150, 1151) AND NOT g.IBTDeliveryNr IS NULL AND g.datum = CONVERT(DATE, GETDATE()) AND (g.warehouse IN('S20', '4', '91') OR (g.warehouse = '90' AND g.aantal < 0)) AND i.UserNumber_11 IN (2,12) ) GROUP BY g.IBTDeliveryNr, g.oms25, i.ItemCode, i.Description_0 ORDER BY g.IBTDeliveryNr

INSERT INTO [PPG_TRANSFER].[dbo].[ORDERS_TO_KARDEX] ([STATUS] ,[ORDERNR], [PRIORITY], [WAREHOUSE], [LINE], [ARTICLE], [QTY], [DIRECTION], [OH_INFO1], [OH_INFO2], [OH_INFO3], [OL_INFO1], [SYSMODIFIED], [SYSCREATED])
SELECT 0 AS STATUS, o.ordernr AS ORDERNR, 1 AS PRIORITY, 'Onderdelen_Mag' AS WAREHOUSE, r.regel AS LINE, r.artcode as ARTICLE, ABS(r.esr_aantal - r.aant_gelev) AS QTY, CASE WHEN ((r.esr_aantal - r.aant_gelev) < 0) THEN 1 ELSE 2 END AS DIRECTION, 'Sales Order' AS OH_INFO1, LEFT(o.refer,50) AS OH_INFO2, LEFT(o.debnr + ' - ' + ord_debtor_name,50) AS OH_INFO3, LEFT(i.Description_0,50) AS OL_INFO1, GETDATE() AS SYSMODIFIED, GETDATE() AS SYSCREATED --,o.afgehandld and o.approved not is null
FROM [400]..orsrg r WITH (NOLOCK) JOIN [400]..orkrg o WITH (NOLOCK) ON r.ordernr = o.ordernr JOIN [400]..items i WITH (NOLOCK) ON r.artcode = i.ItemCode WHERE r.afldat = CONVERT(DATE, GETDATE()) AND o.afgehandld = 0 AND NOT o.Approved IS NULL AND r.magcode = '1' AND o.ord_soort = 'V' AND i.UserNumber_11 IN (2,12) AND (r.esr_aantal - r.aant_gelev) <> 0 AND o.ordernr NOT IN (SELECT [ORDERNR] COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT FROM [PPG_TRANSFER].[dbo].[ORDERS_TO_KARDEX] WHERE CONVERT(DATE, syscreated) = CONVERT(DATE, GETDATE()) AND r.artcode COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT = ARTICLE ) ORDER BY o.ordernr
